Articles.Content: You could have it so you can go into first person on your kerbals and move them about inside your space station, and so you can customise the look of your own kerbonaut. And have crew tunnel parts because that would be awesome!

Please be aware that your first two items are on the what not to suggest list under "Enhanced IVA / moving around in stations or rockets" and "Personalised Kerbals" respectively.

Since the crew tunnels would rely on there being enhanced IVA, Thread Locked. Have a nice day.
